0: I asked for a king bed when I registered for the room but when I got there I was told they did not have anymore
The Inn seemed to need a little update to the room
The shower curtain was not secured to the wall correctly and the carpet seems rather used
Staff not very helpful but rooms and pool are very nice
The bathroom lights were on some kind of timer and went off at the most inopportune times
Went to front desk they quickly changed our room
Had to go to the front desk for a key to the room next to mine to use the hairdryer in there
Our tub was roughly patched from where we are assuming it broke or cracked
After taking a bath I had to manually hold the valve open to drain the tub
Since I had a 70 bike in the room I hesitated to leave
1: The staff informed me they no longer have these rooms available
Great room but pass on the breakfast
The staff and my room was wonderful
Also the room and entire facilities are very clean and comfortable
I liked the layout of the room and the shower and soaps were on point
Great breakfast plenty of options and restocked when it got low
